user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement secure authentication with MFA and user-specific access control.
epics.description: Develop a secure authentication system supporting multi-factor authentication (MFA) through SMS, email, or authentication applications to protect user credentials and prevent unauthorized access. Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure customers can only view features and perform actions aligned with their profile and authorization level. Ensure compliance with financial security and data privacy regulations, and maintain detailed access logs for auditability.

epics.title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
epics.summary: Provide a dynamic, personalized banking dashboard based on user profile and eligibility.
epics.description: Design and implement an intuitive, customizable dashboard tailored to each customer’s financial profile. Display account summaries, product eligibility, active services, and personalized banking offers. Support real-time data updates from integrated core banking APIs to ensure accuracy. Include quick links to frequent actions such as service requests, document uploads, and notifications, optimizing user efficiency and engagement through visual clarity.

epics.title: Self-Service Account and Service Management Workflows
epics.summary: Enable customers to open accounts and modify services through simplified workflows.
epics.description: Create structured workflows allowing customers to open new accounts, modify existing ones, or apply for additional services. Automate data retrieval from customer profiles to minimize manual input and validation errors. Include real-time status updates, contextual help, and streamlined navigation to reduce the number of clicks per action. Integrate backend workflow automation to route requests for approval and processing.

epics.title: Application Save and Resume Functionality
epics.summary: Enable users to save incomplete applications and resume them later.
epics.description: Develop a feature allowing customers to save partially completed applications for account openings or service requests. Implement auto-save capabilities at key interaction points to prevent loss of progress. Provide an ‘In-Progress Applications’ section within the dashboard for easy access to drafts. Ensure data encryption for partially stored applications to maintain confidentiality and compliance with regulatory standards.

epics.title: Secure Document Upload Management
epics.summary: Implement secure document upload and management within the portal.
epics.description: Build a document management system enabling customers to upload identity proofs, financial documents, and supporting files securely during application workflows. Validate file size, type, and security upon upload, with automatic scanning for potential threats. Store all uploaded documents in an encrypted format with secure retrieval mechanisms for processing teams. Provide customers with visibility into uploaded files and their processing status.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Notify customers about their requests through real-time updates and communications.
epics.description: Integrate event-driven notifications to inform customers about updates to their account or service requests. Support communication through email, SMS, and in-app notifications, enabling configurable preferences for each customer. Display real-time request progress in a centralized ‘My Requests’ section. Implement retry mechanisms for failed notification deliveries and log all notifications for compliance and troubleshooting.

epics.title: Customer Interaction History and Audit Trail
epics.summary: Track all customer activities within the portal for review and compliance.
epics.description: Create a comprehensive interaction tracker to record all user actions including logins, form submissions, document uploads, and request history. Provide users with visibility into their historical transactions while ensuring audit logs remain immutable and inaccessible to unauthorized modification. Enable filtering and exporting of history entries for customer convenience, with compliance-ready audit trails for internal banking governance.

epics.title: Integration with Core Banking Systems
epics.summary: Enable seamless synchronization between the self-service portal and core banking systems.
epics.description: Develop secure APIs and middleware components to facilitate real-time interaction between the portal and the bank’s core banking systems. Maintain data consistency for accounts, balances, and customer information. Implement asynchronous data synchronization and error-handling routines to ensure reliability. Include monitoring tools for integration performance and introduce fallback scenarios to manage downtime effectively.

epics.title: Independent Portal Database and Performance Optimization
epics.summary: Create a dedicated, optimized data layer for the portal to maximize performance.
epics.description: Design a stand-alone portal database that operates independently from the core banking system to enhance performance and scalability. Implement data caching, indexing, and connection pooling mechanisms to ensure quick response times under heavy load. Ensure that synchronization jobs keep customer and request data consistent with the core system. Apply advanced monitoring to detect and resolve performance bottlenecks swiftly.

epics.title: Responsive User Experience and Accessibility Design
epics.summary: Ensure cross-device responsiveness and accessible design for all users.
epics.description: Develop a responsive user interface that adapts to varying screen sizes and devices such as desktops, tablets, and mobiles. Follow accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1) to deliver inclusive experiences for users with disabilities. Conduct usability testing to confirm ease of navigation, readability, and performance consistency across browsers and devices. Optimize interface profiles for quick load times and intuitive interactions.

epics.title: Data Security and Regulatory Compliance Framework
epics.summary: Enforce strong security measures and regulatory compliance for banking data.
epics.description: Implement encryption for data at rest and in transit, along with intrusion detection and prevention systems. Follow regulatory frameworks such as GDPR, PCI DSS, and regional banking compliance standards. Conduct recurring security audits, vulnerability assessments, and simulated breach testing. Maintain detailed compliance logs and establish incident response processes to ensure prompt action in the event of a security anomaly.

epics.title: Scalability, Monitoring, and Reliability Management
epics.summary: Ensure the portal operates reliably under variable loads and extensive usage.
epics.description: Implement scalable, high-availability infrastructure capable of supporting peak concurrent user sessions. Introduce system monitoring and analytics tools to proactively track uptime, response times, and service health. Automate alerts for performance degradation, enabling dynamic resource scaling and load balancing. Establish disaster recovery protocols and backup strategies to guarantee uninterrupted service and data protection.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication for User Security
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to use multi-factor authentication, so that I can ensure the security of my account.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must comply with regulatory requirements, support multiple authentication methods, ensure seamless user experience.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can choose from multiple authentication methods.
2. System prompts for MFA during login.
test_cases: Given a user is trying to log in, When they enter their credentials, Then the system should prompt for an additional authentication factor.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Enforce Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to enforce role-based access control, so that users can only access data and services appropriate to their authorization levels.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Roles must be managed centrally, enforce least privilege, and be compliant with regulatory standards.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can only access data and services assigned to their roles.
2. Administrators can manage and assign roles.
test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, When they attempt to access restricted data, Then the system should deny access.

user_stories.epic_title: Secure Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Integrate with Centralized Identity Management Systems
user_stories.description: As a system administrator, I want to integrate with centralized identity management systems, so that we can maintain consistent and secure user policies across the platform.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integration should support password recovery, centralized policy enforcement, and provide user access audit logs.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can recover passwords through the identity management system.
test_cases: Given identity management integration, When a user forgets their password, Then they should be able to recover it through the centralized system.

user_stories.title: Design User-Specific Dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can view banking products and services relevant to my profile.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should dynamically adjust to user profile, highlight active services, and include real-time updates.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard displays user-specific services and offers.
2. Updates are shown in real time.
test_cases: Given a user profile, When the user logs in, Then the dashboard should display products relevant to that user.

user_stories.title: Implement Responsive and Accessible Design
user_stories.description: As a user, I want the dashboard to be accessible and responsive, so that I can use it effectively across all devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Must comply with WCAG standards, provide optimal performance on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard adapts to different device screen sizes.
test_cases: Given a user accessing the dashboard on a mobile device, When the screen size changes, Then the dashboard should adjust accordingly.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Self-Service Account Opening Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want an easy-to-follow workflow for opening a new account, so that I can complete the process quickly and efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow should pre-fill known information, validate data instantly, and guide users step-by-step.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Known information is pre-filled in the application form.
test_cases: Given a user initiating a new account request, When the user inputs data, Then the system should validate the data instantly.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Service Modification Workflow
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a guided workflow for modifying my existing services, so that I can make changes smoothly with clear status updates.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflow should provide clear status updates and ensure integration with back-office systems for tracking and validation.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users receive clear status updates during the modification process.
2. Changes are integrated with the back-office system for tracking.
test_cases: Given a user modifying a service, When they submit the modification request, Then they should receive status updates.

architecture_generation.description: This architecture provides a robust and secure self-service portal for bank customers, ensuring high availability, security, and user experience across various devices using Azure services.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture has been enhanced to address critical security and reliability gaps by adding a Web Application Firewall (WAF) and placeholder nodes for disaster recovery. All nodes and edges have been validated, and the structure adheres to ReactFlow standards with no missing or duplicate elements. The architecture now better aligns with Azure Well-Architected Framework principles, achieving a high-quality rating.
